```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("tidyverse")
library("janitor")
```

```{r}
malaria <- 
  readr::read_csv(file = "data/malaria.csv", 
                  na = c("NA", " ", ".", "-999", "999.0"))
```

```{r}
malaria <- clean_names(malaria)
```

```{r}
head(malaria)
```

```{r}
malaria2 <- 
  malaria %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=starts_with("malaria_rdt"),
               names_to = "age_class",
               values_to = "cases") %>%
  select(newid,data_date, submitted_date, location_name, province, district, age_class, cases)
malaria2
```

```{r}
malaria2 %>%
  filter(data_date=="2020-07-30") %>%
  group_by(district) %>%
  summarise(tot_cases=sum(cases, na.rm = T)) %>%
  arrange(-tot_cases)
```
